name: Cistern's Favor
description:
Ability can be used on military production or technology buildings to increase their work rate by +150%. If used on Mining Camps, Lumber Camps, or Farms, begin generating 160 Gold, Wood, or Food over 60 seconds.
Recharges every 90 seconds.
descriptionCN:
能力可对军事生产或科技建筑使用，使其工作速率 +150%。如果是对采矿场、伐木场或农田使用，则开始产生 160 黄金、木材或食物，持续 60 秒。
每隔 90 秒补充一次。
